task.title: Reassign Employee Shifts
task.shortdesc: The Scheduling feature enables you to reassign shifts to qualified employees and to view warnings to ensure compliance.

step.cmd: Select the team from the drop-down list in the top-left corner.

Select a shift from a specific day next to an employee's name and drag the shift to another employee. The employee shifts cannot overlap, and they cannot overlap onto "non-bookable" holidays or approved time off requests, which appear in the calendar.
To reassign a shift by selecting the Edit (pencil) icon next to an employee's name:

substep.cmd: In the New Assignee field, view a list of qualified employees. To expand the list of available employees, remove the check mark for Best Availability Match, Best Job Match, or Seniority.

step.cmd: Select Re-Publish on the Team Schedule page.
